page.title: 12RECREATION 1
page.content: One of the main ways the local community meet and mix together is by means of sport and social activities linked to the various clubs:football, curling, golf and so on.Perhaps because of the lack of alternative entertainment, the standard achieved, in most sports, despite the small population, is fairly high. The local football team is called the The Vale Of Atholl.The team consists of local workers ranging from school teachers to labourers.The Vale, a long established team, was founded in 1880 .This year they won the League cup and Perthshire cup. The team arranges training for the young,therfore ensuring the continuing sucess of the club.Paul Sturrock,star of Dundee Utd,started his career with the Vale Of Atholl.
